item.title: Cisco ACI â€“ Run Commands on the Switches from your APIC
item.description: With the introduction of the NX-OS like CLI Cisco also added the option to run commands on the switches directly from your apic. It’s now even easier to get some infos from one or multiple switches in your fabric. Show switchname on a single fabric switch 1 2 3 4 5 apic1# fabric leaf01 show switchname ---------------------------------------------------------------- Node 101 (leaf01) ---------------------------------------------------------------- leaf01 You can also run commands on multiple devices
